instruction-for-use.navodila-za-uporabo: Z mehkim robčkom nežno očistite obraz, vrat in predel okrog oči, pri čemer imejte oči zaprte. Po uporabi embalažo dobro zaprite, da se robčki ne izsušijo.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Alcohol Denat., PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sorbitol, Poloxamer 124, Trisodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Decyl Glucoside, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Polyquaternium-10, Citric Acid, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Glucoside, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Acetate, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Sulfate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sorbic Acid, Parfum

title: ČISTILNI ROBČKI MICELLAIR ROSE WATER, NIVEA, 25/1
